entry.codeblock: This element in the Production component records the last significant writing activity, published or otherwise, and should be used with all authors where applicable.

<PLASTLITERARYACTIVITY> <BIBCITS ID="">{1,1}</BIBCITS> <DATE annotationId="" CALENDAR="NEWSTYLE" CERTAINTY="CERT" ID="" offsetId="" VALUE="">{1,1}</DATE> <DATERANGE annotationId="" CALENDAR="NEWSTYLE" CERTAINTY="CERT" EXACT="" FROM="" ID="" offsetId="" TO="">{1,1}</DATERANGE> <DATESTRUCT annotationId="" CALENDAR="NEWSTYLE" CERTAINTY="CERT" offsetId="" VALUE="">{1,1}</DATESTRUCT> <NAME
